body.name: Doorbell Transformer 24V Adapter for Ring Video Doorbell, 16.4ft Long C Wire Power Supply, Compatible with Ring, Nest Hello, Wyze and Eufy Video Doorbells
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 38 mins
features: Wide Compatiblity - 24v universal US power cable powers popular smart doorbells. Compatible with Ring video doorbell (2020 release, 3/4/plus, and pro 1/2), Nest, Eufy, Skybell, Arlo, etc. Continuously converts 110/120v to 24volt 500ma.

Safe and Convenient - “Low battery” issues is solved. The adapter is a quick and convenient way to charge your smart doorbells continuously. Now get rid of all battery issues and with no more interrupt or any safety concerns.

Certificated Safety Adapter - A certificated battery backup is stable and sturdy for years use. A waterproofed 16.4ft cable is long enough for you to put the doorbell any where higher or lower on your wall.
Easy to Install and Maintain - Assemble along the wall from your indoor outlet to the doorbell. The non-polarity wire is much easier for quick installation.
Guaranteed Quality - Package includes 1 transformer adapter with 10 cable clips. 30-day money back. 24/7 professional service team. Contact if you have any questions.
body.description: 24V Power Supply for Ring Video DoorbellCompatibility:Ring Doorbell Series: 2020 Release, Video Doorbell 3/4/Plus, Video Doorbell Pro/Pro2Specification:Input voltage: 120V/AC, 60 Hz;Output voltage: 24V/AC, 500mACable length: 16.4 feet/ 5 meterPackage includes:1 x Adapter10 x cable clips

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Run the wire, connect to Ring Doorbell with 2 wires and plug it in to an electrical socket. Easy and doesn't take any electrical experience. Works very well so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Super simple to install and performs as expected and advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: We didn't want to spend a lot of money on replacing the batteries, so we got this adapter and my husband drilled thru the wall so we can plug in all the time. It worked out perfectly and looks great as we hid the wires and made it look nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for Ring Pro
reviews.reviewText: This works great with a Ring Pro. It doesn’t matter which wire you put with which terminal since it’s just low AC voltage. No need to use the doorbell jumper that comes with the Ring. Also in the app setup just chose the optional power supply choice when setting up the device. Good luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The charger presumably was working great. The issue I ran into was the cold. The area I live in was getting very cold at night, and it looks like that was causing the battery not to charge properly, or discharge faster possibly. The battery was lasting a lot longer than it was before, without question. Though it was still draining slowly. I ended up buying a wired Ring doorbell instead and that has been working perfectly. Of course, that means no battery backup, but I will likely move the other one to another door at some point and grab another of these chargers to charge it. I would give the product 5 stars, but I just don't have a way to test if it was truly the ring doorbell, or if this was somehow not charging it fast enough. I lean more toward the doorbell, but again cannot test that, at least not quite yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great! Had my Ring up in no time!
reviews.reviewText: Nothing fancy here, drill a hole through your wall to where the Ring is going to be mounted, run the wire through, hook it up and enjoy the savings over what Ring would have charged you for the same kit. Have had zero issues with Ring staying powered and working.This wire was absurdly long (I don't think that's a bad thing) so I just snipped it, stripped the wires and ran it at the length I needed. The only downside to this purchase was that their wall fasteners were a little small and few in number, so maybe stop by your local hardware and get some nicer ones?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately I am not satisfied with this ring doorbell transformer.I have installed it as directed which is very easy but it’s not working for me.Everyone else seems to be enjoying theirs and it’s working for them but not for me.It won’t even register on my ring app for my camera as being hardwired as this is what it is do.This is my second time purchasing one of these.This one and the one from ring and neither one works for me but at least the one from ring does indicate that my ring is hardwired but still not keeping it charged as it suppose too.It will start at 100% when I charge it manually and the each day it goes down a little bit more as as it did before even purchasing this adaptor.I’m really not understanding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Last adapter wire got broken. Ordered this as replacement. Came quickly. Working well. Even came with several wire cable clips.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funciona con Logitech circle view doorbell
Me ahorra cargar la batería de mi eufy doorbell e360
reviews.reviewText: Funciona de maravilla y así me olvido del gorro de cargar las baterías de mi timbre
Muy práctico y Sencilla de instalation
Carga muy lento pero a lo mejor es por el timbre
El producto cumple con lo especificado cuenta con suficiente longitud de cable para la instalacion
